Pros:
1. Good gameplay.
2. Donate does not give an advantage
3. A large number of skins
4. Nice graphics.
5. Many interesting "Easter eggs" 
6. New cool acquaintances
7. Do not become "addicted" to the game
8. It is easy to adapt to the game, i.e.  I learned to play it, got used to it in a week.
9. Lots of maps that are easy to learn.
Minuses:
1. Not good rank system, that is, not playing in competitive mode for a year, you become a pro and just "bend" newcomers.
2. Spread.  Some weapons have a very large one.
3. Lots of toxic players.
4. There are many cheaters and they are almost never banned
Well, that's all I wanted to say.  This is my opinion, if you agree with me, then press the plus sign, and if not, then the minus sign.
Good luck with the game!
